contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Ciołek's Missal.jpg|thumb|Ciołek's Missal]] '''''Ciołek's Missal''''' is one of the oldest relics of [[Polish literature]]. Made in 1515, in [[Kraków]], for [[Erazm Ciołek (bishop of Płock)|Erazm Ciołek]], the Archbishop of [[Płock]] it was decorated with figural [[initial]]s, rich borders with motives of crests of the owner ([[Sulima Coat of Arms]]). ==External links== * [http://www.wsp.krakow.pl/whk/zabytki/ciolek.html Mszał Erazma Ciołka] {{pl_icon}} [[Category:1515 works]] [[Category:1515 in Europe]] [[Category:Missals]] [[Category:Christian illuminated manuscripts]] [[Category:Medieval Polish literature]] [[Category:History of Poland (1385–1569)]] [[Category:16th-century Christian texts]] {{christian-book-stub}} {{Poland-hist-stub}}
